name: indexeddbshim
author: Parashuram <code@nparashuram.com>
description: A polyfill for IndexedDB using WebSql

scripts.qunit: grunt clean-qunit && grunt nodequnit && grunt clean-qunit
scripts.mocha: grunt clean-mocha && grunt mocha && grunt clean-mocha
scripts.mock: grunt clean-mock && mocha tests-polyfill/indexedDBmock/*.js && grunt clean-mock
scripts.w3c: grunt clean-w3c && mocha tests-polyfill/w3c/*.js && grunt clean-w3c
scripts.good-mock: grunt clean-mock && mocha tests-polyfill/indexedDBmock/i*.js && mocha tests-polyfill/indexedDBmock/k*.js && mocha tests-polyfill/indexedDBmock/o*.js && mocha tests-polyfill/indexedDBmock/t*.js && grunt clean-mock
scripts.good-w3c: grunt clean-w3c && mocha tests-polyfill/w3c/IDBCursor.advance.js && mocha tests-polyfill/w3c/IDBCursor.continue.js && mocha tests-polyfill/w3c/IDBCursor.delete.js && mocha tests-polyfill/w3c/IDBCursor.update.js && mocha tests-polyfill/w3c/IDBDatabase.createObjectStore.js && mocha tests-polyfill/w3c/IDBDatabase.deleteObjectStore.js && mocha tests-polyfill/w3c/IDBDatabase.transaction.js && mocha tests-polyfill/w3c/IDBFactory.cmp.js && mocha tests-polyfill/w3c/IDBFactory.deleteDatabase.js && mocha tests-polyfill/w3c/IDBIndex.count.js && mocha tests-polyfill/w3c/IDBIndex.js && mocha tests-polyfill/w3c/IDBIndex.openKeyCursor.js && mocha tests-polyfill/w3c/IDBKeyrange.js && mocha tests-polyfill/w3c/IDBObjectStore.clear.js && mocha tests-polyfill/w3c/IDBObjectStore.count.js && mocha tests-polyfill/w3c/IDBObjectStore.delete.js && mocha tests-polyfill/w3c/IDBObjectStore.deleteIndex.js && mocha tests-polyfill/w3c/IDBObjectStore.get.js && mocha tests-polyfill/w3c/IDBObjectStore.index.js && mocha tests-polyfill/w3c/IDBObjectStore.openCursor.js && mocha tests-polyfill/w3c/KeyValidity.js && grunt clean-w3c
scripts.tests-polyfill: grunt clean-polyfill && npm run fake && npm run mock && npm run w3c && browserify-test -t [ babelify --presets es2015 ] tests-polyfill/**/*.js
